actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Trade Zones Act to exempt until June 30, 1986 bicycle component parts which are not re-exported from the exemption from the customs laws otherwise available to merchandise in foreign trade zones.

summary.text: Amends the Foreign Trade Zones Act to provide, until June 30, 1986, that bicycle component parts shall not be exempt under the customs exemption provided by such Act unless the parts are re-exported from the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Trade Zones Act to exempt until June 30, 1986 bicycle component parts which are not re-exported from the exemption from the customs laws otherwise available to merchandise in foreign trade zones.
